Insurance Financial Advisor Job at Stanbic IBTC Insurance




        
    

        
        Stanbic IBTC Insurance is part of stanbic holdings PLC. Its a positioned end to end insurance provider in Nigeria with expert services. We do everything in our power to ensure that we provide our vlients with products, services and solutions that suits their needs.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Insurance Financial Advisor

Job Locations: Abuja (FCT), Abia, Bayelsa, Delta, Edo, Ekiti, Kaduna, Lagos, Ogun, Ondo, Oyo & Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	As an Insurance Financial Advisor, you will provide expert guidance to clients on managing risk and achieving financial goals through insurance and financial products.


Responsibilities


	Conduct financial assessments and risk analyses for clients
	Develop personalized financial plans, including insurance recommendations
	Provide guidance on life insurance, health insurance, disability insurance, and other financial products
	Help clients set and achieve long-term financial goals, such as retirement planning
	Build and maintain relationships with clients to ensure ongoing support and guidance


Requirements


	OND, HND, or B.Sc in any discipline
	0-1 year of experience in any field (insurance experience is an added advantage)
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
	Ability to analyze complex financial data and provide clear recommendations.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: osejiifeoma8@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Scrum Master, Agent",
  "description": "Tek Experts provides the services of a uniquely passionate and expert workforce that takes intense pride in helping companies manage their business operations. We care about the work we do, the companies we partner with and the customers they serve.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Scrum Master, Agent

Req ID:&nbsp;16937
Job Location:&nbsp;Victoria Island, Lagos
Job Type: Full-time
Category: Information Technology

Responsibilities


	Facilitate all Scrum ceremonies: Sprint Planning, Daily Stand-ups, Sprint Reviews, and Retrospectives.
	Guide and coach the team on Agile/Scrum practices and values.
	Remove impediments and foster a culture of continuous improvement.
	Track and report team metrics (velocity, burndown charts, etc.) to stakeholders.
	Collaborate with Product Owners to ensure a well-groomed and prioritized backlog.
	Support cross-functional coordination and dependency management.
	Champion agile adoption across the organization and mentor junior Scrum Masters.
	Ensure alignment with enterprise delivery frameworks and governance.


Qualifications
Education &amp; Certifications:


	Bachelor&rsquo;s Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Business, or related field.
	Agile certifications (Scrum Master, SAFe Agilist, PMI-ACP) are advantageous.
	Scrum Master certification (CSM, PSM I/II) preferred.


Experience &amp; Skills:


	3+ years of experience as a Scrum Master in a technology or fintech environment.
	Strong understanding of Agile frameworks (Scrum, Kanban, SAFe).
	Experience working with APIs, microservices, and digital channels is a plus.
	Proficiency in Agile tools (e.g., Jira, Azure DevOps, Confluence).
	Excellent facilitation, coaching, and conflict-resolution skills.
	Strong stakeholder engagement and communication abilities.


Personal Attributes:


	Proactive and solution-oriented mindset.
	Empathetic leadership and team-building skills.
	High emotional intelligence and adaptability.
	Strong organizational and time management skills.

Job Location: Victoria Island, Lagos

Responsibilities

	Strong stakeholder engagement and communication abilities.


Personal Attributes:


	Proactive and solution-oriented mindset.

	High emotional intelligence and adaptability.
